member.name: HARDWAREINPUT
member.summary: Contains information about a simulated message generated by an input device other than a keyboard or mouse.

member.name: HARDWAREINPUT.uMsg
member.summary: The message generated by the input hardware.

member.name: HARDWAREINPUT.wParamL
member.summary: The low-order word of the lParam parameter for uMsg.

member.name: HARDWAREINPUT.wParamH
member.summary: The high-order word of the lParam parameter for uMsg.
